page.title: 10TRANSPORT (West Block)
page.content: {Skellingthorpe { Buses:}There is no Sunday service. There a 11 buses during the day the last one from Lincoln leaving at 1740. Residents thought this was a poor service.Most of the buses go on to Saxilby,but some run to Gainsborough. { By-pass:}Residents welcomed this.It would lessen through traffic in the village and provide easier access to many places. { Cars:}A large percentage of households had a car. {Traffic Survey Between 1000 & 1020 on 10.6.85 along Skellingthorpe Rd. 81 vehicles came from Lincoln,31 proceeded to Skellingthorpe,the rest turned into Birchwood.125 vehicles travelled towards Lincoln.Between 1630 & 1650 215 vehicles from Lincoln,114 vehicles to Birchwood,113 vehicles to Lincoln.
